name: One Night On Fireblood Mountain
description:
Is your fate sealed?

Created this small game in roughly 30 days. Feedback welcome.

---

When the moon turns to blood and burns like fire, will you survive the night? Threats close in from above and below. Is your fate sealed?

---

Controls: This game is focused on full mouse support. There is partial keyboard support for movement using WASD or Arrows, but gamepad is not officially supported.

---

Release target was Halloween 2020, but missed it by an hour or two.

Hours spent: 97
